title: Who Fact Checks The Disinformation Board? | Daily Best of April 29 | Rick & Bubba
description:
The Biden Administration announced plans for a “Disinformation Governance Board” which will be headed by Nina Jankowicz, who claimed Hunter Biden's laptop was fake news and supported the Steele dossier as fact. In one of the worst examples yet, Joe Biden struggles to speak as he asks Congress for $33 billion to support Ukraine. Sean Hannity says he misses Rick & Bubba. Speedy thinks he's going to be attacked by a man with nunchucks, and Rick almost lights a chipmunk on fire.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
